text.section: The Baltimore City Board of License Commissioners may issue a WS (wine sampling) license to bona fide nonprofit organizations.
The fee for this license is $15 per day.
The Board of License Commissioners may not grant more than 12 WS licenses to any 1 bona fide nonprofit organization in each license year.
Application shall be made for this license at least 15 days before the date on which the license is issued.

The WS license permits the transportation of wine and the consumption of wine for sampling purposes:
On a Class B or Class B-D-7 licensed premises with the authorization of the respective holder; or
On a premises that is not permanently licensed under this article.
A holder may not serve more than 2 ounces of wine from a given brand to any one person.
